title: League of legends prepaid card giving error and then saying already been redeemed
body: so i bought this rp card and tried to enter the code in but it said error, so then I thought i might've typed it in wrong and tried again with the exact code on the card and now it says its already been redeemed. Someone please tell me what to do!

replies.body: It certainly sounds strange that a new card would say it's been redeemed already.  We'd like to help with your issue individually and look into this further!  Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to us so we can see what's going on.  We'll respond asap!
